description:
This course if for any sales professional who has a hard time scheduling their day. Let's face it no matter what you are selling we all need a daily plan. We found what works! The TOP Sales performers have this schedule in common.

This course provides 5 proven techniques by TOP Sales Performers that help increase sales. I'll help you create a daily plan that works! I'll give you a weekly and monthly road map that will work for any type of product or service you are selling.

This course should take you less 1 hour to complete and about 90 days once you have created your personal schedule to see results. I'll provide you with sample detailed documents to help you along the way.

BEAT the CLOCK - Daily Schedule for SUCCESS includes these topics:

  1. Personal Plan
  2. Sales Quota
  3. Your Market (or territory)
  4. CRM
  5. The SCHEDULE

After completing this course I know when you begin to implement this plan - you are sure to be on your way to going beyond your sales quota and wake up with your road map to sales success.
title: Beat the Clock: How to Create Your Daily Success Schedule
